general.label: Licence
general.comment:
License Keys: You can find your license key on your order conformation mail or login to you account at Magmodules.eu
Need development license keys? Please go to My License Keys in our store to generate a development license key.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: A valid license key is required in order to enable the module.

note.label: Choose the general configuration admin settings, different product types, cronjob, and email sender. You can select these options for each specific store view.

cron.label: Use Cron
cron.tooltip: You can use the cronjob to send emails automatically.

link_bundle.label: Link bundle to parent
link_bundle.tooltip: Link to parent product URL in review emails.

link_group.label: Link group to parent
link_group.tooltip: Link to parent product URL in review emails.

review_bundle.label: Add review to bundle parent
review_bundle.tooltip: Add the review to the parent product of the bundle instead of the simple product.

review_group.label: Add review to group parent
review_group.tooltip: Add the review to the parent product of the grouped product instead of the simple product.

toolbar_block.label: Add Notification Toolbar
toolbar_block.tooltip: Adds a notification toolbar to the admin displaying pending reviews.

orders_block.label: Add Block to Order View
orders_block.tooltip: Adds a review email status block to the order view page in the admin.

note.label: Create a personal frontend page by editing the welcome text, success page text and coupon introduction. This way, you can further encourage the customer to leave a review. It’s possible to disable the visibility of the form if a customer has already written a review about your product(s). Of course, you may also set a personal message for whenever this happens.

Edit and personalize all the features within your first email reminder. Configure the general settings and adjust the style of the email so that it perfectly suits your brand. There are multiple blocks within the email. The alignment of these blocks is the same as in the email reminder and you may de-activate, activate or edit the blocks to suit your needs. Set the button to “Button: Review Email Page” to make use of our unique frontend review form.

reviewemail_status.label: Order Status
reviewemail_status.tooltip: Schedule email after the order has passed this status

reviewemail_days.label: Schedule After Days
reviewemail_days.tooltip: Schedule email to be sent after x-days

reviewemail_backlog.label: Maximum Days old
reviewemail_backlog.tooltip: Do not schedule orders older than x-days

first_review_hash.label: Productpage link hash
first_review_hash.tooltip: Use a Hashtag (#) to jump to Review section on your productpage

note.label: Edit and personalize all the features within the second e-mail reminder. It is possible to disable this second e-mail if customers have already written a review through the link in the first e-mail reminder. The scheduled number of days will be from the first email.

exclusive.label: Only send to customers who have not written a first review

reviewemail_days.label: Schedule After Days
reviewemail_days.tooltip: Schedule email to be sent after x-days after first email

second_review_hash.label: Productpage link hash
second_review_hash.tooltip: Use a Hashtag (#) to jump to Review section on your productpage

note.label: Reward your customers with a discount code and get even more reviews. Create a Shopping cart price rule with the auto generation function enabled and select the trigger. You may choose to show the discount code on the success page whenever the customer has written a review, or send the discount code through an e-mail after receiving or even after you’ve approved the review in your store. Further personalize this message by editing the coupon description field.

coupon_message.label: Coupon Description
coupon_message.comment: Message displayed to the customer. Available variables: {{expiration_date}} & {{coupon_code}}

ruleid.label: Shopping Cart Price Rule
ruleid.tooltip: See: "Admin -> Promotion -> Shopping Cart Price Rule"

note.label: Check if the first and second e-mail reminders suit your needs by sending a test email. Before you hit the send button, ensure that you have saved the config after filling in a valid order number and email address.

Ask for a general shop review in the same form by integrating the shopreview extension with the product review reminder. This way, you can let your customers write both shop reviews and product reviews in the same form. Check out our shopreview extension right here.

stopcoupon.label: Force one coupon
stopcoupon.comment: If yes, there will be no coupon issues for the shopreview if the customer already has a coupon given for writing a product review.

disable_email.label: Disable shopreview emails
disable_email.comment: If yes, all the mails regarding the shopreview will be disabled.
